ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Question for the elder bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks!  That makes a ton of difference.  I was nowhere *near* melee range for most, if not all, of my attempts.  Goes under the heading of things I wish
ygData.messageBody:
> In order to cast spells on them (bard songs included)
> you need to be within melee range.

Thanks! That makes a ton of difference. I was nowhere *near* melee
range for most, if not all, of my attempts. Goes under the heading of
"things I wish I had known before." Perhaps I will make it back to Perma
some day soon, afterall.

-Karisma
